channel.title: [relesed server,pi, ddos protected vps] Need more Developers[steady eco]
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FfRCn4m.png[/img]
Hello, I am the main owner, Harrison, the founder of Anuvis.com. Anuvis is a brand new rsps released 1/24/14. There is an increasing number of players joining every day, with a steady 6+ player economy online most of the time. Keep in mind this is a new server, with new content, and bug fixes rolling out daily. This is not another leech server. We have spent a lot of time testing and developing this server for the players. There are a handful of cool, custom items that we have implemented in the game to give it some fun uniqueness! This server is currently hosted on a SSD DDoS-Protected VPS! There is no need to worry about downtime, I myself am covering all the bills at this time. There have been roughly $60 in donations thus far, being saved for an advertisement spot with moparscape. Once we achieve this goal, the donations will be evenly split out amongst all of the administrative staff We are really excited for the potential of the server and we are in desperate need for experienced, positive developers' help. There are currently 2 developers excluding myself, however we are considering impeaching one of the developers for being extremely lazy and unproductive. On another popular server status page we have about 20 votes for the server. If you are seriously considering joining the team you must be active, and have a skype. You can add my skype, my account is Microchip1233. -Harrison
